RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 1 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 76. Allowance Purse 35800. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OPTIONAL, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 24 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since February 24 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MIDNIGHT IN OHIO sprinted to a clear lead soon after the start, set all the pace while getting quick fractions and widened at the will to win as much the best under confident handling. LADY JASPER chased the winner inside rivals and finished clear for second. CUE THE BAND chased the pace between rivals into the stretch and faded late. MARGARITA CINCO chased the leader three wide into the stretch then weakened. SEEKING THE MONEY trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Lady Jasper
ENTRY.OWNER: Blazing Meadows Farm LLC and S G M Thoroughbred Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, inside, clear second

ENTRY.NAME: Midnight in Ohio
ENTRY.OWNER: Blue Snow Racing Stables and Wolochuk, David
ENTRY.COMMENT: sprinted clear, widened, much the best, confident handling

ENTRY.NAME: Seeking the Money
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Cue the Band
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, between horses, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Margarita Cinco
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, 3 wide, weakened lane

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 2 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 82. Claiming Purse 11800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE APRIL 24, 2022. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SEMINOLE JUSTICE stalked the early pace three wide, rallied two wide to make the lead midway on the turn, drifted to the six path entering the stretch, was headed nearing the furlong marker then fought back gamely under left handed urging and proved best by the narrowest of margins. PEANUTS PERFECTION had good early speed along the rail, dropped back a bit then shifted out three wide on the turn, was carried out to the seven path by the winner while drawing on even terms for the lead at the top of the stretch, gained a narrow advantage, battled through the final furlong and just failed. LORD OF LEGENDS never far back, finished with good courage along the inside. BIG TRIP away alertly, set the pace two wide then along the inside into the turn, had speed into the stretch then weakened. DUEL FUEL was no factor. DERBYS MONEYMAKER trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Lord of Legends
ENTRY.COMMENT: never far back, finished well, inside,

ENTRY.NAME: Peanuts Perfection
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside spd, shifted out turn, carried 7p, narrow lead,just failed

ENTRY.NAME: Seminole Justice
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked 3w, surged turn, drifted 6p, top lane, headed,fought back

ENTRY.NAME: Duel Fuel
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Big Trip
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace mid turn, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Derbys Moneymaker
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 3 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 34. Maiden Special Weight Purse 33900. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: QUEENOFTHEBUCKEYE sprinted up the inside to make the lead before a quarter, set a pressured pace into the stretch, shook clear before the furlong marker and prevailed under a strong hand ride. CANELA FINA had good early speed near the inside, shifted outward on the turn, rallied in the seven path through the stretch and finished clear for second. TITEBLUEJEANS close up four wide, angled inside a drifting rival in mid stretch and passed tiring rivals. MISS MARY JEAN pressured the winner two wide into the stretch, drifted out before the eighth pole and weakened. MY TWO JAKES was no factor. GHOSTLY REVIVAL prompted the early pace three wide, had speed into the stretch then gave way. MISS IRISH ZIP had brief speed.

ENTRY.NAME: Queenofthebuckeye
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pressured pace, shook clear upper stretch,

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Mr. & Mrs. Louis V. Ruberto Jr.

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Mary Jean
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta's Racing Stable and Urieta Johanna
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, drifted out upper stretch, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Ghostly Revival
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 3 wide, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Canela Fina
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside speed, angled out turn, rallied 7path, clear second

ENTRY.NAME: Titebluejeans
ENTRY.COMMENT: close 4 wide, angled in mid stretch, passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Irish Zip
ENTRY.OWNER: Graff, Anne C. and Grueber, Jeanne K.
ENTRY.COMMENT: brief speed,

ENTRY.NAME: My Two Jakes
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 4 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 87. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 21700. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $8,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $12,500. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 24 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Sin ce February 24 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Claiming Races For $8,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RENO TOUCH broke in full stride to set all the pace, shook clear in upper stretch and prevailed under strong handling. RADIANTRITHYM trailed early, improved position two wide through the turn, dropped inside in upper stretch, closed willingly but was too late. BLUSHING BETTY forwardly place, finished determinedly in the five path. SHELLEY'S GEM stalked the pace along the inside into the stretch, shifted out to the four wide path then was outfinished. PRINCESS HALIME well placed, failed to respond. DIVINE MARTHA pressured the winner three then two wide into the stretch then weakened. SIERRA DIAMOND checked along the rail near the five eighths pole, saved ground and gave way in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Sierra Diamond
ENTRY.COMMENT: checked inside 5/8pole, saved ground, gave way lane

ENTRY.NAME: Shelley's Gem
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked inside, angled out 4path upper stretch, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Radiantrithym
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed early, improved 2 wide turn, late surge rail, gaining,

ENTRY.NAME: Blushing Betty
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, finished determinedly 5path

ENTRY.NAME: Princess Halime
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, failed to respond,

ENTRY.NAME: Divine Martha
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 3-2wide, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Reno Touch
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, led throughout, shook clear, driving,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 37. Maiden Special Weight Purse 33900. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FABULOUS CLOWN broke in front then dropped back a bit settling three wide, moved up rapidly through the turn to make the lead in upper stretch then finished full of run through the final furlong to win as much the best while going away. WAY OF THE WORLD vied for the lead along the inside and was no match for the winner. MERE BAG OF SHELLS close up from the start, offered a mild bid three wide into the stretch then was outfinished. EMERALD EYES trailed early, swung wide and passed tiring rivals. BOLD NICKY pressed the pace two wide into the turn and was through after three furlongs. HONEYBEE STINGS sped to the lead soon after the start, set a pressured pace for three furlong then was used up.

ENTRY.NAME: Honeybee Stings
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pressured pace mid turn, used up,

ENTRY.NAME: Bold Nicky
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, through after 3furlongs

ENTRY.NAME: Mere Bag of Shells
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 3 wide, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Emerald Eyes
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, swung wide, passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Way of the World
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead inside, no match for winner,

ENTRY.NAME: Fabulous Clown
ENTRY.OWNER: R and P Racing Stables, LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, dropped back, came again, much the best,going away

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 65. Allowance Purse 38400. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 24 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since February 24 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Le ss Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PAINT THE TOWN stalked the pace three wide into the turn, responded under a right handed whip to make the lead in deep stretch and won under strong handling. GIV'EM THE BIZ away alertly, set the pace until deep stretch then couldn't handle the winner. WOLFINE stalked the pace two wide and went evenly. UNEEDTOCOMEHOME failed to menace. TWINSPIREDJOEY pressed the early pace along the rail, steadied entering the turn and was through after a half. CATMAN JACK trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Paint the Town
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 3 wide, perfect trip, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Giv'em the Biz
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace late stretch, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Uneedtocomehome
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Catman Jack
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Twinspiredjoey
ENTRY.OWNER: Urieta Racing Stable and Quinteros Delia
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, inside, steadied 3/8 pole, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Wolfine
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 2 wide, evenly,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 7 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 39. Maiden Special Weight Purse 33900. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MUSIC GEM saved ground through the turn, shifted out to the seven path entering the stretch, closed with a burst of speed through deep stretch and got up in the final stride. MY HOMBRE away alertly, set a pressured pace along the inside into the stretch, edged clear before the furlong marker and just missed hanging on. NOSEY POWER settled mid pack four wide and finished with good courage in the seven path. SOL OF VAQUERO stalked the early pace three wide, moved up two wide into the stretch then leveled off. TRANSPIRED pressed the pace two wide into the stretch and faded late. ATILANO'S THUNDER broke slowly and was no threat. STRIKING AGAIN vied for the lead along the inside into the stretch then gave way. BIG TIME FLIRT with the second flight two wide, was through after a half. WHY KENNY WHY dropped back from an alert start and trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Music Gem
ENTRY.COMMENT: inside early, angled out 7path, closed fast, up in final stride

ENTRY.NAME: Striking Again
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead inside, gave way lane

ENTRY.NAME: My Hombre
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace, edged clear late, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Atilano's Thunder
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke slowly, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Big Time Flirt
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, 2 wide, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Nosey Power
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle of pack, 4 wide, finished well 7path

ENTRY.NAME: Why Kenny Why
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped back, trailed,

ENTRY.NAME: Sol of Vaquero
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 3 wide, middle move, 2 wide, leveled off

ENTRY.NAME: Transpired
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, faded late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 8 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 65. Claiming Purse 11800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since March 24 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since February 24 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: VOODOOISM checked along the rail neat the seven sixteenths pole, swung wide, closed with a burst of speed through deep stretch and was along in time. TURBIE pressed the early pace three wide, responded with a rapid move to make the lead at the top of the stretch, shook clear then couldn't handle the late charge of the winner. V K PRINCESS unhurried early, found her best stride late near the middle of the racetrack. VAVITE was bumped hard at the start then failed to menace. LELAWALA trialed into the stretch, swung out past the middle of the racetrack and passed tiring rivals. MARIMBA vied for the lead three then two wide into the stretch then faded. STORMY BELLA away alertly, set a pressured pace for just over a half then gave way. UNDERCOVER LADY was bumped at the start, moved up four wide on the turn then came up empty. HOPS PETUNIA bore in badly bumping rivals at the start, loomed boldly along the rail through the turn then was used up.

ENTRY.NAME: Voodooism
ENTRY.COMMENT: checked rail 7/16pole, swung wide, closed fast, in time

ENTRY.NAME: Vavite
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: V K Princess
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, best stride late, mid track

ENTRY.NAME: Stormy Bella
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace turn, gave way lane

ENTRY.NAME: Undercover Lady
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, middle move, 4 wide, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Hops Petunia
ENTRY.COMMENT: bore in badly, bumped start, loomed rail, used up

ENTRY.NAME: Turbie
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 3 wide, quick move, clear lead late, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Lelawala
ENTRY.COMMENT: passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Marimba
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead, 3-2wide, faded lane
